titles.title: Honoring Our Veterans By Exercising The Right To Vote On Veterans Day Act
To designate Veterans Day as the Tuesday after the first Monday in November.
Honoring Our Veterans By Exercising The Right To Vote On Veterans Day Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Honoring Our Veterans By Exercising The Right To Vote On Veterans Day Act - Moves Veterans Day from November 11 to the Tuesday after the first Monday in November each year.
